data.title: Team
data.meta_description: CROSS builds a single network inventory, integrating data from any network system and the network itself.
data.text:
Radim Just

Chief Executive Officer

Radim is Chief Executive Officer at CNI. He has spent his entire career in Telecommunications, holding senior positions at various companies, delivering several transformative customer projects, and while at CNI, successfully led the Operations and Service Delivery teams as COO.

Karel Hodan

Chief Technical Officer

Karel Hodan is responsible for the vision, technical evolution and development of CNI’s products and solutions. Prior to founding CNI, Karel held a number of technical and leadership positions in companies such as TietoEnator and SDC.

Bohdan Cech

Director of Product

Bohdan heads product for CNI, ensuring that delivery is aligned with the company’s overall vision, customer requirements and evolving roadmap. He has over 15 years of experience in telecom software development, having held many key positions as well as founding and running an ISP.

Pavel Fiala

Senior OSS Architect

As CNI’s Senior OSS Architect, Pavel Fiala supports the successful delivery of CROSS projects and drives product innovation. With over 20 years’ experience, gained in operators such as T-Mobile, Pavel brings a wealth of experience in leading OSS teams, building networks, and working in NOCs.

Jiri Sila

Product specialist

With experience in both T-Mobile and GTS Czech, Jiri excels in understanding and presenting complex technical solutions. As a Documentation Specialist, Jiri ensures clear and user-friendly documentation, while hands-on experience in field telecommunications adds a practical edge to his expertise.

Jiri Pargac

Project Manager

With a background as an IT product specialist and expertise in field telecommunication, Jiri brings a unique skill set to project management. His proficiency in understanding complex technical solutions and managing projects positions him as a valuable asset in the dynamic landscape of network intelligence.
